verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> ye the <S%H1697>word<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> unto <S%H1004>you<s%>, O house of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H3925>Learn<s%> not the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and be not <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at the <S%H226>signs<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; for the <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at <S%H1992>them<s%>.

For the <S%H2708>customs<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> are <S%H1892>vanity<s%>; for one <S%H3772>cutteth<s%> a <S%H6086>tree<s%> out of the <S%H3293>forest<s%>, the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H2796>workman<s%> with the <S%H4621>axe<s%>.
They <S%H3302>deck<s%> it with <S%H3701>silver<s%> and with <S%H2091>gold<s%>; they <S%H2388>fasten<s%> it with <S%H4548>nails<s%> and with <S%H4717>hammers<s%>, that it move <S%H6328>not<s%>.

They are <S%H4749>like<s%> a <S%H8560>palm-tree<s%>, of turned <S%H1696>work<s%>, and speak <S%H5375>not<s%>: they must needs be <S%H5375>borne<s%>, because they cannot <S%H6805>go<s%>. Be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H7489>them<s%>; for they cannot do evil, neither is it in them to do <S%H3190>good<s%>.
There is none like unto <S%H3068>thee<s%>, O Jehovah; thou art <S%H1419>great<s%>, and thy <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> in <S%H1369>might<s%>.

Who should not <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H4428>thee<s%>, O King of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>? for to thee doth it <S%H2969>appertain<s%>; forasmuch as among all the <S%H2450>wise<s%> men of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and in all their royal <S%H4438>estate<s%>, there is none like unto thee.
But they are <S%H259>together<s%> <S%H1197>brutish<s%> and <S%H3688>foolish<s%>: the <S%H4148>instruction<s%> of <S%H6086>idols<s%>! it is but a <S%H6086>stock<s%>.

There is <S%H3701>silver<s%> beaten into <S%H7554>plates<s%>, which is <S%H935>brought<s%> from <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%>, and <S%H2091>gold<s%> from <S%H210>Uphaz<s%>, the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H2796>artificer<s%> and of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H6884>goldsmith<s%>; <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> for their <S%H3830>clothing<s%>; they are all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of skilful <S%H2450>men<s%>.

But <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is the <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>; he is the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%>: at his <S%H7110>wrath<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7493>trembleth<s%>, and the <S%H1471>nations<s%> are not able to <S%H3557>abide<s%> his <S%H2195>indignation<s%>.

Thus <S%H1836><s%> shall ye <S%H560>say<s%> unto <S%H426>them<s%>, The gods that have <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H5648>made<s%> the <S%H8065>heavens<s%> and the <S%H778>earth<s%>, these shall <S%H7>perish<s%> from the <S%H772>earth<s%>, and from <S%H8460>under<s%> <S%H429>the<s%> <S%H8065>heavens<s%>.

He hath <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> by his <S%H3581>power<s%>, he hath <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> by his <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, and by his <S%H2451>understanding<s%> hath he stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>:

when he <S%H5414>uttereth<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, there is a <S%H1995>tumult<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and he causeth the <S%H5387>vapors<s%> to <S%H5927>ascend<s%> from the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; he <S%H6213>maketh<s%> <S%H1300>lightnings<s%> for the <S%H4306>rain<s%>, and bringeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> out of his <S%H214>treasuries<s%>.

Every <S%H120>man<s%> is become <S%H1197>brutish<s%> and is without <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>; every <S%H6884>goldsmith<s%> is put to <S%H3001>shame<s%> by his graven <S%H5262>image<s%>; for his molten <S%H5262>image<s%> is <S%H8267>falsehood<s%>, and there is no breath in <S%H7307>them<s%>.
They are <S%H1892>vanity<s%>, a <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H8595>delusion<s%>: in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H6486>visitation<s%> they shall <S%H6>perish<s%>.

The <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is not like <S%H3335>these<s%>; for he is the former of all <S%H3478>things<s%>; and Israel is the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name<s%>.
Gather <S%H622>up<s%> thy <S%H3666>wares<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%>, O thou that <S%H3427>abidest<s%> in the <S%H4692>siege<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H7049>Behold<s%>, I will sling out the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> at this <S%H6471>time<s%>, and will <S%H6887>distress<s%> <S%H4672>them<s%>, that they may feel it.

Woe <S%H188><s%> is me because of my <S%H7667>hurt<s%>! my <S%H4347>wound<s%> is <S%H2470>grievous<s%>: but I <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H389>Truly<s%> this is my <S%H2483>grief<s%>, and I must bear <S%H5375>it<s%>.

My <S%H168>tent<s%> is <S%H7703>destroyed<s%>, and all my <S%H4340>cords<s%> are <S%H5423>broken<s%>: my <S%H1121>children<s%> are gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H5186>me<s%>, and they are not: there is none to spread my <S%H168>tent<s%> any <S%H6965>more<s%>, and to set up my <S%H3407>curtains<s%>.

For the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> are become <S%H1197>brutish<s%>, and have not <S%H1875>inquired<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: therefore they have not <S%H7919>prospered<s%>, and all their <S%H4830>flocks<s%> are <S%H6327>scattered<s%>.

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8052>tidings<s%>, <S%H935>behold<s%>, it cometh, and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7494>commotion<s%> out of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>, to <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%>, a <S%H4583>dwelling-place<s%> of <S%H8577>jackals<s%>.

O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, I <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> is not in <S%H376>himself<s%>: it is not in man that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> to <S%H3559>direct<s%> his <S%H6806>steps<s%>.
O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H3256>correct<s%> <S%H4941>me<s%>, but in measure: not in thine <S%H639>anger<s%>, lest thou bring me to <S%H4591>nothing<s%>.

Pour <S%H8210>out<s%> thy <S%H2534>wrath<s%> upon the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H3045>know<s%> thee <S%H4940>not<s%>, and upon the families that <S%H7121>call<s%> not on thy <S%H8034>name<s%>: for they have <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H398>yea<s%>, they have devoured him and <S%H3615>consumed<s%> <S%H8074>him<s%>, and have laid waste his <S%H5116>habitation<s%>.
